0x0600
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

0x0000
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

0x0200
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

# Pause for one clock cycle
0x0400
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

# Send '1' to FIFO
0x0C01
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

# Send '2' to FIFO
0x0C02
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

# Send '3' to FIFO
0x0C03
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

# Pause for two clock cycles
0x0400
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

0x0400
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

# Read '1' from RX FIFO
0x1400
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

0x1400
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

# Read '2' from RX FIFO
0x1400
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

0x1400
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

# Read '3' from RX FIFO
0x1400
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

0x1400
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000

# Pause for one clock cycle
0x0400
0x0000
0x0000
0x0000
